itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Demihuman Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Longbow of Destruction, Demihuman Longbow of Temptation, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Maple Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Seclusion, Castle Ruins, Bloody Monastery, Northern Plain of Serendia, and Mediah Northern Highlands. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Maple Trees.

item.name: Pure Tin Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Tin Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Tough Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Trace of Savagery
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Lynch Farm Ruins.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Grade 3 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Demihuman Longbow
item.desc: A longbow made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Temptation, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Destruction, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Longbow
